text: I’m still an advocate for #SARS_CoV2 #covid19 cocktail based on all the research. 1) #Hydroxychloroquine 2) #ZINC 3) #remdesivir 4) #azithromycine .. should be taken at first sign of infection (symptomatic) with positive test. Longer you wait loses efficacy.
